languages.text: "Я прощаю эти убийства, ибо они были оправданы. Но впредь не нарушай моего запрета".

traits.locale_text: "В этот раз я прощаю твои убийства, ибо они были оправданы. Но впредь не нарушай моего запрета".

languages.text: "I pardon you for these killings, for they were justified. But do not defy me again."
languages.original_text: "Я прощаю эти убийства, ибо они были оправданы. Но впредь не нарушай моего запрета".

traits.locale_text: "I pardon you these killings, for they were justified. Do not defy me again."
"I pardon you these killings, for they were justified. Do not defy me again."
"I pardon you for these killings, for they were justified. But do not defy me again."
"I pardon you for these killings, for they were justified. But do not defy me again."
"I pardon you for these killings, for they were justified. But do not defy me again."
"I pardon you for these killings, for they were justified. But do not defy me again."

languages.text: «Le perdono esas muertes, ya que estaban justificadas. Pero no vuelva a desafiarme».
languages.original_text: "I pardon you for these killings, for they were justified. But do not defy me again."

traits.locale_text: «Le perdono esas muertes, ya que estaban justificadas. Pero no vuelva a desafiarme».

languages.text: 「正当なものであったため、この殺害については赦そう。だが、二度と逆らうな」
languages.original_text: "I pardon you for these killings, for they were justified. But do not defy me again."

traits.locale_text: 「正当なものであったため、この殺害については赦そう。だが、二度と逆らうな」

languages.text: “我原谅你的杀戮行为，因为这是正当之举，但以后别再违反命令了。”
languages.original_text: "I pardon you for these killings, for they were justified. But do not defy me again."

traits.locale_text: “我原谅你的杀戮行为，因为这是正当之举，但以后别再违反命令了。”

languages.text: "Ich begnadige Euch wegen dieser Morde, weil sie gerechtfertigt waren. Aber widersetzt Euch mir nie wieder."
languages.original_text: "I pardon you for these killings, for they were justified. But do not defy me again."

traits.locale_text: "Ich begnadige Euch wegen dieser Morde, weil sie gerechtfertigt waren. Aber widersetzt Euch mir nie wieder."

languages.text: « Je vous pardonne ces meurtres, car ils étaient justifiés, mais ne vous avisez plus jamais de défier mon autorité. »
languages.original_text: "I pardon you for these killings, for they were justified. But do not defy me again."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous pardonne ces meurtres, car ils étaient justifiés, mais ne vous avisez plus jamais de défier mon autorité. »

languages.text: "Haklı gerekçelerin olduğundan bu katliamlar için seni bağışlıyorum. Fakat bir daha bana kafa tutma."
languages.original_text: "I pardon you for these killings, for they were justified. But do not defy me again."
